content:
The avatar is at (7, 1). There are monsters around. I need to move away from the monsters. I will move right, away from the monster on the left.
Action: 2
I expect to move to (7, 2).

The avatar is at (7, 2). There are monsters at (1, 1), (4, 3), (7, 3), (9, 4), and (11, 1). There are boxes at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), and (12, 24). I need to avoid the monsters and try to reach the boxes. Moving right seems like a good starting point.

Action: 2
I'm moving right to avoid the monster to my left.
